channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Old Guard 2’ Hits Netflix With Disastrous Rotten Tomatoes Scores
item.description: The Old Guard 2 has hit Netflix, but the sequel has arrived with way worse Rotten Tomatoes scores than the first film.

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ Creator’s Alternate Season 3 Ending Is Way Better
item.description: The ending of Squid Game season 3 was bad, but its creator has revealed it could have been so much better.

item.title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Saturday, July 5
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: NYT ‘Strands’ Hints Today For Saturday, July 5: Spangram Answers Every Second Counts
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Strands? An extra hint and the answers are right here to help you finish the grid and keep your streak intact.

item.title: Responding To Bungie’s Comments On My ‘Destiny 2’ Edge Of Fate Article
